To run art node: 
Miner 1 Nodes
$ go run art-app.go [minerAddr] 

Miner 2 Nodes
$ go run art-app.go [minerAddr] 

Miner 3 Modes
$ go run art-app.go [minerAddr] 

Miner 4 Nodes
$ go run art-app.go [minerAddr] 

Miner 5 Nodes
$ go run art-app.go [minerAddr]

For Demo:
Ink Miner #1 has 3 Art Nodes
Ink Miner #2 has 1 Art Nodes
Ink Miner #3 has 2 Art Nodes
Ink Miner #4 has 1 Art Nodes
Ink Miner #5 has 0 Art Nodes

- 1 Miner shows InsufficientInkError, OutOfBoundsError
- 1 Miner shows ShapeOverlapError
    - try to overlap with same miner's shapes with same art node and different art nodes
    - try to overlap with other miners' shapes
- 1 Miner shows InvalidShapeSvgStringError, ShapeSvgStringTooLongError, InvalidBlockHashError

Nice to have:
